long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right click to search your selected text on TheStoryGraph.

Select the text that you'd like to search, it can be the book title, the author, or the ISBN, right click, and choose "Search on TheStoryGraph".

_________

Enjoy, and if you encounter any bugs, or have any suggestions, please let me know!
